description: This file defines the AppRouter class which manages the application's routing logic, including route generation with authentication guards, and helper methods for navigation. It sets up route names and determines initial routes based on authentication state.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A utility class that manages route generation with authentication guards, initial route determination, and navigation helpers.

methods.name: initialRoute
methods.description: Determines the initial route based on whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates routes for navigation, applying authentication guards for protected pages.

methods.name: guardedPushNamed
methods.description: Performs protected navigation, redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
